BallTreePointSet class¶

class BallTreePointSet.BallTreePointSet(points, path=None, intensity=None, range_accuracy=0.002, angle_accuracy=0.012, measurement_accuracy=0.002, leaf_size=40, **kwargs)[source]¶
__init__(points, path=None, intensity=None, range_accuracy=0.002, angle_accuracy=0.012, measurement_accuracy=0.002, leaf_size=40, **kwargs)[source]¶

A ball tree representation

Parameters

  • points (PointSet, np.array) – the points to represent as ball tree

  • leaf_size (int) – minimal number of points in a leaf, with the maximal \(2\cdot\) leaf_size

Attributes

Methods

Private Methods

_BallTreePointSet__ComputeNodeLevel(index)

Compute the level of a node in the tree defined by its index.

_BallTreePointSet__ballTreeNodeHierarchy()

Reconstruct the tree hierarchy based on the internal indexes of the points in each node

_BallTreePointSet__findChildNodes(i)

Finds the child nodes of the i-th node in the tree

_BallTreePointSet__getFirstNodeOfSize(index, …)

Get the first node along one of the tree branches whose radius is larger than a given one

_BallTreePointSet__initializeBallTree(…)

Initialize the object according to the type of the input points

_BallTreePointSet__setParent(i)

Sets ths i-th node as the parent of its child nodes

getSmallestNodesOfSize(radius, startingNode='root')[source]¶

Get a list of the smallest nodes whose radii are larger than a given radius

Parameters

  • radius (float) – The minimal required size of the nodes

  • startingNode (str) – Starting node for the search of the smallest node. Can be ‘root’ (top-down) or ‘leaves’ (bottom-up). Default: ‘root’

Returns

list of the smallest nodes indices (ints)

Return type

list (int), None

Returns

maximum level of the tree

Return type

int

numberOfNodes¶

Retrieve the total number of nodes in the ball tree

Returns

The number of nodes in the ball tree

query(pnts, k)[source]¶

Query the ball tree for the k nearest neighbors of a given set of points

Parameters

  • pnts (np.array nx3) – The query points

  • k (int) – The number of neighbors to find for the point

Returns

The indexes for the neighbors of the points

Return type

list of np.array

Note

Return the query points themselves as the first index of each list

queryRadius(pnts, radius)[source]¶

Query the ball tree to find the neighbors of a given set of point inside a given radius

Parameters

  • pnts (np.array nx3) – The query points

  • radius (float) – The query radius

Returns

The indexes for the neighbors of the points

Return type

list of np.array

Note

Return the query points themselves as the first index of each list
